revision.text:
<!--대학_정보-->
{{TemplateMapping
| mapToClass = University
| mappings =
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 이름 | ontologyProperty = foaf:name }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 교훈 | ontologyProperty = motto }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 설립 | ontologyProperty = foundingDate }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 개교 | ontologyProperty = foundingDate }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 폐교 | ontologyProperty = closed }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 종류 | ontologyProperty = type }}

	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 총장 | ontologyProperty = president }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 부총장 | ontologyProperty = vicePresident }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 학장 | ontologyProperty = provost }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 국가 | ontologyProperty = country }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 학생수 | ontologyProperty = numberOfStudents }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 상징 | ontologyProperty = mascot }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 학교색 | ontologyProperty = officialSchoolColour }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 종교 | ontologyProperty = religion }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 웹사이트 | ontologyProperty = foaf:homepage }}

end}}

<!-- Not Yet Mapping
|설립자   = 
|위치     = 
|규모     = 
|학부     = 
|대학원   = 
|교직원수 = 
|학교법인 = 
-->
